channel.title: Merchant (Neutral Offensive)
channel.description:
Merchant: Neutral Offensive
Passive: Haggler: Occupy and redirect immune.
Day Ability: Pay Bail: Force pardon someone. One use.
Night Ability: Sell Wares: Occupy someone. Unlimited uses.
Night Ability 2: Advertise. Make all your visitors target your target. Unlimited uses.
Goal: Stall the game for 9 days.
Just an odd idea I had. Not sure if it would hold up, but I feel like it is an interesting neutral goal, though it is against both the factions.

item.title: Merchant (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I would like to give you a theme:

The Merchant

Passive: Clever ----> Haggler

Day Ability: Pay Bail

Night Ability 1: Stall -----> Sell Wares

Night Ability 2: Divert ----> Advertise

If everyone dies, the Merchant can’t sell stuff, right?

So he needs to ensure he can survive until Day 9, and make the game prolong itself.
